Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: Southbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland, over regular route, due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland, over regular route, due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks near Rosemont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks near Rosemont. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
